blog.name: marvelzombiespromos
blog.title: Marvel Zombies Promos
blog.description:
This is the promo page for Marvel Zombies RP. For more information, please visit our main page.

The characters advertised are not an exclusive list, rather they are a short list of suggestions. Our intention is to maintain a rotor of characters from a variety of backgrounds. Please feel free to apply outside of the characters posted here.

summary: Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales Requested by: Peter Parker Telephone networks have failed, the internet is...
caption:
Marvel Zombies RP Wanted Connection: Miles Morales
Requested by: Peter Parker

Telephone networks have failed, the internet is gone.  Modern communication seems to have come to an end.  What remains is radiowaves.  People with the right equipment have begun to communicate with anyone in range using CB radios, walkie talkies, whatever they can get their hands on.  Some are broadcasting, some are just listening.

As he tuned the radio through the various channels, looking for news, Miles heard the end of a series of coordinates.  As the static cleared, a familiar voice sounded, a voice he had not heard in over a year –

This is Peter Parker broadcasting for Miles Morales. I know you are a survivor so you are out there somewhere. This is no city, but its got video games, good people, strong walls and plenty to eat. Also hot showers are a thing here so yeah try to find your way here kid. Us spiders need to stick together.

Marvel Zombies RP is a Marvel Comics AU roleplay established 1 April 2017. We look forward to surviving with you.

Home || Plot || Rules || Taken/Open Characters || FAQ || Most Wanted

summary:
Marvel comics: hey guys! You wanna see a bunch of your favorite spider characters come together?
Us: yeah! Will we get to see...
body:
Marvel comics: hey guys! You wanna see a bunch of your favorite spider characters come together?

Us: yeah! Will we get to see them actually interact and hang out together and talk about their worlds and have fun adventures together?

Marvel comics: Nope! You get to watch them get killed by Morlun and his family of recolors with little to no actual interaction besides “let’s fight these overpowered villains and try not to die”! Basically like the first event but less characters.

Us: that’s…that’s not really what we want.

Marvel comics: too bad! Wait, where are you going?

Us: we’re going to just wait for the “into the spider-verse” movie and make fanart and fanfics that actually have what we want.

Marvel comics: wait! Annie and Mayday will finally meet! They won’t really get to hang out or get to know each other and be chased down by the annoying blonde Morlun twins but—

Us: *already gone*

summary: Sorry for being so MIA lately! I’ve been busy working on my video game “The Truth Hurts” with Lil’ Witch Games and overall I’ve...
caption:
Sorry for being so MIA lately! I’ve been busy working on my video game “The Truth Hurts” with Lil’ Witch Games and overall I’ve just kinda been in a funk. I’m doing better and hope I can have a chapter of Prototype or Hemocyte for you by the weekend :) Here’s some concept art of the Hemocyte suit I designed to give you a better idea where the story is heading ;)

Hemocyte - also known as the Bat of NYC

He’s the protagonist of my new Male!Reader x Peter Parker fic based in Insomniac’s Spider-Man (PS4) Universe. You - the reader - are Hemocyte, by night at least. By day, you’re a good friend of Peter’s as well as a Geneticist Intern at a Genetic Laboratory. After an incident, you get certain abilities, as well as certain drawbacks. Eventually, the line between Hero and Monster becomes blurred…

I’ve always wanted to design a Super-Suit. I drew inspiration from Batman & Catwoman (DC) as well as Black Cat & Morbius (Marvel).

tags: shut up meagan no one cares
i like analyzing the trailers shut up
summary: i like how in some of the trailers for "Into the Spider-Verse", the Prowler is chasing Miles in what I assume to be near the...
body:
i like how in some of the trailers for “Into the Spider-Verse”, the Prowler is chasing Miles in what I assume to be near the beginning of the movie due to the fact he’s wearing a crappy version of Peter’s suit. This can show that Miles is inexperienced and very clumsy when first starting out, and so is very easy prey for the Prowler.


but then in other trailers from when I assume is near the ending or middle of the movie, Miles- in his very own, awesome suit- is chasing Prowler instead of the other way around. This could be seen as showing that Miles has developed as a hero and has now turned the tables, making the Prowler his prey instead of the other way around.

reblog.comment:
